tasks.task_description: Check current directory and project structure

Create comprehensive README.md with project overview
Set up project structure with apps, services, workers, and packages
Add remote origin and push initial commit

description: Create remote GitHub repository for Smart Sweet Distribution Platform (SSDP) with comprehensive project structure
context: Confirmed git repository is already initialized and checked current directory structure. Found existing PDFs related to sweet distribution platform.
